landingPageRichText.raw:
{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Criminal-legal injustice has been around for centuries — but so has the movement to counter this injustice and build supportive, inclusive communities that are truly safe for all people. 

This section traces that movement from its earliest moments, marking key milestones of both injustice and resistance to that injustice. Above all, this section shows how the movement for dignity and human rights lives on today — through the thousands of policy and organizing campaigns taking place across the United States at this very moment.

Learn about our movement. Find where our movement is making change now. And, most importantly, join a campaign and become part of this living history. 
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-entry-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4oFfOqTLnSvlk7lT4395Fi","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

left.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A movement 400 years in the making","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Building on the work of activists who came before us, we’re rejecting systems rooted in white supremacy and envisioning a new paradigm of public safety that truly keeps communities safe. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-entry-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"1HCt757NWUDbfL9jyBvmUi","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

right.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Join the Movement to Reimagine Safety","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\nThere are many ways to make a difference in your community. Check out our campaign map to find opportunities for you to get involved and advocate for change. Together, let’s reimagine what safety means.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-entry-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"685jiBEFXJyFZ5SWm3tl6D","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

subPageHero.subPageHeroSubtitle: Our platform expands our view of public safety, furthers equity, and constitutes effective policy.

leftText.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Get involved in Vision for Justice and join the movement to reimagine safety in America!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

rightText.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Explore our voting resources and learn how you can help transform the system when we vote for justice.\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
